```{r homework}
x <- c(2, 4, 5, 8, 10, 23, 36)
y <- 2 + (3 * x)
line_1 <- tibble(
  x = x,
  y = y
)

  geom_point(size = 5) +
  labs(title = bquote(italic(y) == 2 + 3 * italic(x)))
```

# Linear model: the basics

---

```{r sample-2}
x <- sample(1:100, 50)
y <- 2 + (3 * x) + rnorm(length(x), 0, 10)

line_2 <- tibble(x, y)

ggplot(line_2, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(size = 5) +
  labs(title = bquote(italic(y) == "?" + "?" * italic(x)))
```

---

```{r line-lm, echo=TRUE}
line_lm <- lm(y ~ x, data = line_2)
summary(line_lm)
```

---

```{r line-model}
ggplot(line_2, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(size = 5, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_abline(intercept = 2, slope = 3, size = 2) +
  labs(title = bquote(italic(y) == "2" + "3" * italic(x)))
```

---

layout: false

# Standard error

```{r se}
ggplot(line_2, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(size = 5, alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_abline(intercept = rnorm(100, 2, 2.66), slope = rnorm(100, 3, 0.05), size = 0.5, alpha = 0.05) +
  labs(title = bquote(italic(y) == "2" + "3" * italic(x)))
```

---

layout: true

# Residuals

---

```{r line-model-2}
ggplot(line_2, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(size = 5, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_abline(intercept = 2, slope = 3, size = 2) +
  labs(title = bquote(italic(y) == "2" + "3" * italic(x)))
```

---

```{r line-model-3}
ggplot(line_2, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.2) +
  geom_abline(intercept = 2, slope = 3, size = 1) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = x, xend = x, y = y, yend = 2 + 3 * x), colour = "red") +
  labs(title = bquote(italic(y) == "2" + "3" * italic(x)))
```

# Model checks

---

```{r qq-plots, fig.asp=1}
plot(line_lm, which = 2)
```

---

```{r nonlinear}
x_c <- sample(1:100, 50)
y_c <- 2 + (3 * x_c) + (0.5 * x_c^2) + rnorm(length(x_c), 0, 100)

curve <- tibble(x_c, y_c)

curve %>%
  ggplot(aes(x_c, y_c)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

---

```{r nonlinear-residuals, fig.asp=1}
curve_lm <- lm(y_c ~ x_c, data = curve)

plot(curve_lm, which = 2)
```
